DOC.brief_summary: It already know animal study study drug improve mucosal immunity show increased serum mucosal IgA secretion . This study evaluate safety oral intake natural product 2006-RD-05 recommended daily dose 300 mg . In addition , trial aim determine intake able ot improve serum salivary IgA synthesis .
DOC.brief_title: Effects 2006-RD-05 Salivary Serum Immunoglobulin A ( IgA ) Levels Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 60 In good health BMI 20 30 kg/m2 Nonsmoking Allergic study drug Use immunemodulating drug Uncontrolled hypertension ( Systolic > 140 diastolic > 90 ) Women childbearing age use proper contraception , pregnant breastfeeding
